content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drill found) and another stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) 
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities (burner-mining-drill, burner-inserter, boiler, steam-engine) have fuel before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities (stone-furnace) have ingredients before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using entities that are not connected to a network
-  Ensure that entities (steam-engine, electricity-group) are connected to a network before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using entities that are not plugged into an electric network
-  Ensure that entities (electricity-group) are plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
